attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To the New Prime Minister
stop the war in Iraq bring the trops home,then you can afford to give the pensioners a decent rise 
Also abolish Council Tax for pensioners then you would be giving the pensioner another £25 to £30 a week to live on.
Bring us in line with the pensioners in the Republic of Ireland.
 Ireland do not have the cost of a war therefore they can look after the older people they also have a strong economy
Many people in Britain have worked and fort for their country and what do we get? a hard hard life!

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
